column1: We reccomend using the tools below to build the hand yourself, you may be able to build it without the tools but it will be more difficult

column3: This makes routing cables super easy, without it assembly becomes challenging (still possible)
Secure pins if they are too loose, use instead of loctite on fasteners (not reccomended)
required for bonding silicone to plastic
To help fish cable through certain features
Helps to reach hard to reach bolts without stripping screws
Necessary to print your own parts
For heat inserts and if making soldered wire connections
for marking servo numbers and cable lengths
